text: Thomas Ludwig Albert Oppermann (27 April 1954 – 25 October 2020) was a German politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party (SPD). He was born in Freckenhorst, West Germany. From 2005 until his death, he was a member of the Bundestag. He was Vice President of the Bundestag from 2017 until 2020. He was also Leader of the Social Democratic Party between 2013 to 2017. Oppermann died on 25 October 2020 from a heart attack at a hospital in Göttingen, Germany at the age of 66.Thomas Oppermann: Leading German politician dies at 66 ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Politicians from Lower Saxony
title: Thomas Oppermann
